title: Can't acess my ticket
body:
Hello,i am trying to restore my old account,i remembered some really "in-depth" stuff,that only i could know (transfered from EUNE-->EUW---->EUNE) with rp purchases,in less then 5 hours,anyway i cannot acess my ticket (need to login) and i do not have any credentials to log in,so i could add this ^ thing out to my ticket,if any of admins/staff members would edit my ticket status,or note the support staff to check this information from above,since i could not add it manually(when trying to acess the ticket(support page)it gives me and login page,and no credentials were used to create ticket(username/pw))
Anyway thanks in advance,ticket id #23565290

replies.body: For account recovery tickets, correspondence is done by email since you're naturally unable to log into the support site. An email with your ticket should've been sent to you, and you can respond to that with the additional information.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=G0Io50ls,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-03T08:57:24.284+0000)
>
> For account recovery tickets, correspondence is done by email since you're naturally unable to log into the support site. An email with your ticket should've been sent to you, and you can respond to that with the additional information.

Yes,i realise that,i've got link (in auto-responder) from support@leagueoflegends.com to acess my ticket,but when i click on link,its giving me error "Need to login first"and cant actually get to it...could someone help me out?
You don't follow the link, you reply to that email directly.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=G0Io50ls,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-03T10:50:11.445+0000)
>
> You don't follow the link, you reply to that email directly.

If you want to review your request or add additional comments, click the link below:

http://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/xxxx

That's an automated part of the email that applies to most tickets, but not account recovery tickets. Once an account specialist reaches out, you can reply to their email and provide the additional context you remembered. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
